name: Alone - Make A Friend
description:
Nameless, a shadow that collects objects after the humans disappeared, finds clues to his past, and his missing friend.

This is a prototype of a game concept I'm working on in my illustration animation degree. It was my first time coding and using Construct 2, so I'm glad that I've even made something haha.

This is dedicated to my little brother Terry.

Credit to Kim Hoang, her tutorial has saved my life!!

And music credit goes to:

"Comfortable Mystery 2" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
